Name: ObjectInfo
Summary: Contains information for a block of raw serialized object data.

FileID.Remarks: Unique ID that identifies the object. Can be used as a key for a map.

ByteStart.Remarks: Add to <see cref="SerializedFileHeader.DataOffset"/> to get the absolute offset within the serialized file.

TypeID.Summary: New versions: Type index in <see cref="SerializedFileMetadata.Types"/> array.
TypeID.Remarks: Old versions: Type ID of the object, which is mapped to <see cref="SerializedType.TypeID"/>. Equals to classID if the object is not <see cref="ClassIDType.MonoBehaviour"/>
